nodes.name: create a nginx config file in sites-enabled directory

parameters.command: source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && yarn cache clean && yarn install

parameters.content: ## Setting up Slack for providing notification of success with the various deployment details.

## Setting up nginx config, testing and reloading
This portion contains the commands to setup the nginx config file in /etc/nginx/sites-enabled directory.

Then test the nginx connection and then reload it.

## Installing and Setting up Yarn Package Manager ---> running build
Command to install and setup yarn package manager
Command to set the heap size
Command to install project packages using yarn
Command to build the yarn project

## Setting up .env
Just some of commands to copy .env.example to .env

## SSH into VM and pull the develop branch
Use respective credentials for SSH
Doing git stash and checkout to develop branch
then pull from develop branch
